title: 06/17/2021 - HOUR 2 - Lebron James, Jason Terry and Aaron Rodgers
itunes:title: 06/17/2021 - HOUR 2 - Lebron James, Jason Terry and Aaron Rodgers
description:
Lebron James jumps on the bandwagon to tell the league, "I told you so" in terms of injuries and the affects of the bubble last season. Jason Terry joins the show to talk NBA Playoffs, injuries and more. Aaron Rodgers was called selfish by a GM. Do players deserve a little more lee-way ?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
